TopicTitle: Game sometimes switches to windowed mode on new startup

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: micro engineer, custom flags, cheat menu | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: i7-10870H | GPU: RTX 3070 | RAM: 16GB

 

Like the name says For some reason occasionally the game just swaps back to windowed when I open it up again. This more often happens after crashes but can happen at any time.

 

Edited July 8, 2023 by Anth12
